body_html:
Solution for me was to comment

linkopts = [“-lgomp”]

in tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD.tpl. I now have a working build :)

Via: https://metakermit.com/2017/compiling-tensorflow-with-gpu-support-on-a-macbook-pro/
body_text:
Solution for me was to comment
linkopts = [“-lgomp”]
in tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD.tpl. I now have a working build :)
Via: https://metakermit.com/2017/compiling-tensorflow-with-gpu-support-on-a-macbook-pro/
body:
Solution for me was to comment 

`linkopts = [“-lgomp”]`

in tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD.tpl. I now have a working build :)

Via: https://metakermit.com/2017/compiling-tensorflow-with-gpu-support-on-a-macbook-pro/
